explains: n. [数] 公理；格言；自明之理

sentences.en: It is an axiom in the business world that a satisfied customer is the best advertisement.
sentences.cn: 满意的顾客是最好的广告，这是商界的格言。

sentences.en: We should explore the relation between the Martin Axiom and Continuum Hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 我们应该探讨马丁公理和连续统假设之间的关系。
